page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This rural area is predominately one of farmland and woodland lying at the northern extremity of West Sussex. Population is light and sparse. It is a delightful area of outstanding beauty and charm. It is a haven for those with occupations in London who like the peace and quiet of a country area after working hours.Its situation facilitates easy travel to London and the coast in a very short time. Life in 1985 Housing Employment Education Leisure Time Games Children Play Transport Famous Inhabitants Reminiscence in Rhyme Acknowledgments
